I was looking for a sock that wasn’t too thick, with a subtle ruffle to wear with white sneakers or my crocs. These fit the bill. I got the larger size. I wear a women’s size 9W shoe. The heel part is a little longer than I need but I wanted the extra room because of having wide feet. They are somewhat see through on me. This is noticeable when I wear them with black leggings with the sock over the legging. I covered that by folding the socks over so the doubled part covers the bottom of the legging which works pretty well. If you have thicker ankles/calves then the ruffle seam isn’t very apparent but that is to be expected. I will probably look for some with a more prominent ruffle instead of a ruffle seam to have more options. On first wear I had some fuzzies come off but nothing crazy.
I have the white version of these and love them bought more sets- the black is a lot smaller than the white one
Love these. Great with a sneaker or a boot.
They look pretty close to the picture maybe slightly less ruffled. They’re a little itchy too but I’m hoping washing a few times will help.
I was hoping these would not feel thin. They are 88% cotton but I guess that’s not enough to make them feel comfortable. They feel slippery and make my feet sweaty.

Then I decided to keep them as non ruffled socks, becasue the fabric is soft and felt like good quality, but the seam on the toes ripped on both feet within 4 hours of wearing them.  Very dissappinted.

and well made socks! Plus not super heavy and thick. Perfect to wear with clogs, sneakers, booties, etc. The “ frill” on the top edges were what sold me! I bought 2 packs. A white pack and then pack with black, tan, more Fall colors!

评论概述: Great socks that are comfy and cute!

I would definitely recommend these socks for cute sock lovers.

This is a 6-pack of just-above-the-ankle socks. Colors are black, white, cream/ivory, taupe, light brown, and dark brown. Fabric is 70% cotton, 28% polyester, 2% spandex. I would have preferred a higher cotton percentage, but these socks are fine. Fit is as expected, and these socks are comfortable and do the job. Would recommend.
I ordered these in black awhile back so wanted to get some white ones for summer. They are very soft and comfortable and the frills are a fun touch.
